response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I am confident will significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute to your success, is priced at $1,200,000. My aim is to ensure that we both derive substantial benefits from this transaction. I believe that this price offers an excellent balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and its potential impact on your business.

I am looking forward to discussing this offer with you further and exploring how we can collaborate to make this a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
